ygData.msgSnippet: ... should ... powerful ... folks ... it. ... any ... You call the pet a long-term DOT? We re both talking about the same
ygData.messageBody:
> NO LIFETAP! i've been ragging on this forever, people keep saying we
should
> have lifetaps, and i have to keep saying no :) either they would be too
> underpowered for us and be a total waste of space, or they'd be too
powerful
> and make us one step closer to being a god class. we aren't playing UO
folks
> :) while something like that would be NICE, we sure as heck do not NEED
it.
> anyway i'd take a long-term DOT via the pet over a lifetap for 20 or 30
any
> day. you DO realize how slow those spells cast? :)

You call the pet a long-term DOT? We're both talking about the same
half-our-level-and-does-nothing-but-cause-trouble-and-take-exp pet, right? I
can't believe you want those over ANY kind of lifetap spell! Ok, so let's
compromise -- I don't want pets, you don't want lifetaps, so what other
necro spells could we get instead? Buffs? That shrieking aura type damage
shield? Don't just say "NO LIFETAP!", Beld, throw me a bone here, let's be
constructive...

Dravith V
